name: FREM
short_description:
Freeware Realtime strategy Engine when use Mana.
-game engine for OS MSDOS, WiNDOWS and LINUX
-writeln in language C++(mingw32)
-used library allegro!
-this project is based on RTSENG project found on Internet
-2d tiles system with support mouse
-su
